entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is shaking with grief and remorse when Harry sees him.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist of the story. Harry mentions that he would have found out about Hagrid's secret even if Hagrid hadn't told him.

relationships.description: Harry is an enemy of Voldemort, as mentioned in the conversation between Harry and Hagrid.
Hagrid is a target of Voldemort's discovery, as Harry mentions that Voldemort would have found out about Hagrid's secret even if Hagrid hadn't told him.
